column2: A custom ViewPager title strip which gives continuous feedback to the user when scrolling

Hi @ogaclejapan,  I really liked your library, I implemented iOS version of this lib like 1 year ago, but did not get chance to make it library, recently I got chance to do it, it is in here now https://github.com/EzimetYusup/WormTabStrip . 
if don't mind, can you put this in your README ? I know at that time I was looking for iOS version, but could't find it, maybe some people out there looking for it.
Thanks!
